miic.core.miic_utils.save_dict_to_matlab_file¶

save_dict_to_matlab_file(filename, dictionary)[source]¶

Save a dictionary to a matlab file.

Save values stored in a dictionary as variables having the name of the key in a matlab file.

Parameters:
  • dictionary – dicitonary to be saved
  • filename (str) – name of the matlab file to be created
